contact.title: Add Contact Form
contact.description: Let visitors reach you easily with a professional contact form
contact.prompt: Add a contact form with name, email, and message fields

pricing.title: Add Pricing Section
pricing.description: Show your pricing plans to help customers decide
pricing.prompt: Add a pricing section with different plan options

faq.title: Add FAQ Section
faq.description: Answer common questions to reduce support inquiries
faq.prompt: Add a frequently asked questions section

testimonials.title: Add Testimonials
testimonials.description: Build trust with customer reviews and testimonials
testimonials.prompt: Add a testimonials section with customer reviews

about.title: Add About Section
about.description: Tell your story and connect with visitors
about.prompt: Add an about section describing the company or team

services.title: Add Services Section
services.description: Showcase what you offer to potential clients
services.prompt: Add a services section highlighting key offerings

portfolio.title: Add Portfolio
portfolio.description: Display your best work to attract new clients
portfolio.prompt: Add a portfolio section showcasing previous projects

team.title: Add Team Section
team.description: Introduce your team to build personal connections
team.prompt: Add a team section with member profiles

booking.title: Add Booking System
booking.prompt: Add a booking or appointment scheduling feature

payment.title: Add Payment Options
payment.description: Accept payments directly on your website
payment.prompt: Add payment processing with checkout functionality

gallery.title: Add Image Gallery
gallery.description: Showcase photos in an attractive gallery layout
gallery.prompt: Add an image gallery with lightbox functionality

newsletter.title: Add Newsletter Signup
newsletter.description: Build your email list with a signup form

blog.title: Add Blog Section
blog.description: Share updates and improve SEO with a blog
blog.prompt: Add a blog section for articles and updates

social.title: Add Social Links
social.prompt: Add social media links and sharing buttons

seo.title: Improve SEO
seo.description: Optimize for search engines to get more visitors
seo.prompt: Add proper meta tags, structured data, and SEO optimization

analytics.title: Add Analytics
analytics.description: Track visitor behavior and measure performance
analytics.prompt: Add analytics tracking to monitor website traffic

mobile.title: Optimize for Mobile
mobile.description: Ensure great experience on all devices
mobile.prompt: Improve mobile responsiveness and touch interactions

accessibility.title: Improve Accessibility
accessibility.description: Make the site usable for everyone
accessibility.prompt: Add proper accessibility features and ARIA labels

darkMode.title: Add Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Let users switch between light and dark themes
darkMode.prompt: Add a dark mode toggle with theme switching
